mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.project_no AS "projectNo", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", office.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office office ON office.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_info( id, project_no, project_name, office_id, status, longitude, latitude, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectNo}, #{projectName}, #{office.id}, #{status}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE project_info SET project_no = #{projectNo}, project_name = #{projectName}, office_id = #{office.id}, status = #{status}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.* FROM project_info a where ${propertyName} = '${value}'
